page.title: 13PEOPLE AT MARLEY HILL SCHOOL
page.content: In 1985{MARLEY HILL PRIMARY SCHOOL has 118 pupils.Only 6 children live in Marley Hill,but 98 children live in Sunniside,10 pupils live in Byermoor,2 live in Streetgate and 2 travel from Whickham.Many pupils travel to School by bus,some are brought by car. There are two infant classes and four junior classes.We have a Headmaster, secretary, six full time teachers, one part time remedial teacher and three music teachers who come in once a week to teach some pupils brass,woodwind and guitar. There is one cook and two kitchen maids.At dinner time the children are looked after by three dinner nannies. The school has one caretaker and two cleaners.A warden sees the children across the road.She is called a Lollipop lady because of the big stick she holds to stop the traffic.
